detail_desc: Fitted polo-neck top in soft modal jersey with long sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud (sizes 7-10Y with a normal button).
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and side pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Cropped blazer in woven fabric with notch lapels, a covered button at the front, seams at the front and long sleeves. Unlined.

Straight-cut, boxy-style jacket in windproof, functional fabric made from recycled polyester. Hood with an elastic drawstring, a zip down the front and discreet front pockets. Long raglan sleeves with wide jersey ribbing and thumbholes at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Short, A-line dress in mesh with reversible sequins. Low neckline at the back and long sleeves. Jersey lining.
Two-strand anklet of thin metal chains, one with small pendants. Adjustable length 23–27 cm.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Three-strand necklace in metal chains of various designs, one with a moon-shaped pendant and one with a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length.

Calf-length dress in a cotton weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and wide, detachable tie belt under the bust. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication, and a gathered seam under the bust and above the hem for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Fleece-lined jacket in windproof, water-repellent nylon. Hood with a drawstring at the front, drip-free peak and an elasticated drawstring at the back to allow it to fit comfortably and snugly on the head. High collar, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a yoke front and back. Chest pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs, and an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Covered elastication at the cuffs, and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the hem that can be adjusted at the sides.
Short top in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Fitted trousers in sturdy jersey with a concealed zip in the side and slim legs with a concealed zip at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slightly lower crotch. Relaxed fit over the bum and thighs with tapered legs from the knees down.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Linen joggers with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a shaped neckline and short, flounced sleeves. Opening and button at the back of the neck, a wide, elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt, side pockets and straight legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and slim legs.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts. T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbed trim around the neckline. Knee-length, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch twill with worn details that are patched on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist and a zip fly and press-stud.
5-pocket, ankle-length, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and legs with twisted seams and narrow hems with slits.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Tunic in softly draping jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and gently rounded hem.

Microfibre T-shirt bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Without visible seams for greater comfort.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide poncho top in soft, printed jersey with short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Strapless bandeau bras in microfibre with a jersey-lined front section that gives the bust a natural shape and light support. No fasteners.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist and a decorative bow at the front. One pair with frill details, the other with an all-over print.
Hair elastics with a knot. Width 1.5 cm.
3/4-length trousers in jersey with covered elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.

Jacket in a viscose weave with a sheen. Shawl collar, covered buttons at the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs. Detachable belt at the waist, and decorative piping at the front and cuffs. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft, gently draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Bandeau bra in sturdy microfibre with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, removable inserts and soft, concealed elastication at the top and bottom. Lined at the front.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with scallop-trimmed necklines and armholes. One vest top with decorative buttons at the top.
Oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and buttons at the front. Fake pocket at the top, welt front pockets with a flap, buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Short dress in airy plumeti with a deep, lace-trimmed, wrapover V-neck and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and a flared skirt with a seam, flounce and lace trim at the hem. Lined.
Short yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.

Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, two buttons at the front, a chest pocket and two flap front pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide panel at the top, side pockets and fold-down cuffs at the hems.
V-neck blouse in a viscose crêpe weave in a relaxed fit with a gathered yoke at the back, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in jersey made from an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit with a sewn-on bow tie at the top and long sleeves. Sewn-on waistcoat with buttons down the front and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Mittens in a soft knit with ribbed, foldover cuffs and a fleece lining. Size 0-6M without thumbs.

Boxy, straight-style jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck at the back leading to a draped knot detail at the hem. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves. The jumper is made partly from recycled polyester.
Sandals in imitation suede with an adjustable hook and loop fastener on one side. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.

Padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, a stand-up collar and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets, narrow, concealed elastication at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Small shoulder bag with a metal chain shoulder strap, zip at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 6x15x23 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
V-neck knitted jumper with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with ribbed shafts and elasticated tops.
Fitted top in organic cotton soft jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in soft, fine-knit cashmere with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waistband, back pocket and straight, wide legs with decorative seams at the front and roll-edge hems.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
One-shoulder top in jersey with a double layer of frills at the top.

Cropped blouse in a patterned cotton weave with a sweetheart neckline and elastication at the shoulders. Short balloon sleeves with elastication and a frill trim. Twisted detail at the front and a concealed zip at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with lacing at the front, padded cups with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Satin blouse with long sleeves, a V-neck with inset lace trims and wide cuffs with a covered button.
Fitted T-shirts in soft, stretch organic cotton jersey with a V-neck and straight-cut hem.
Soft slippers with embroidery and appliqués. High shaft with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Short skirt in a softly draping weave with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and pleats at the top to create soft draping. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine, fluffy knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a fine-knit mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in soft, ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Top in soft pile with a double-layered stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Tunic in soft fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless, flared top in jacquard-weave viscose with elastication and a small frill trim around the top and wide, bow-topped shoulder straps.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a boat neck and short, open sleeves with ties. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with adjustable, double shoulder straps and padded, triangular cups with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a round neckline and inset lace sections on the sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.
